name: SPEED TROUSERS
description:
Your mum's been stolen by the Amorphous Mouth! 

Use the power of your SPEED TROUSERS to catch up and rescue her!

The entire game can be played with ONE BUTTON: 

T. 

Of course. 

[Made for the One Button Game Jam]

Also includes excessive JAZZ BEATS.

--------------

CONTROLS:

Hold T to boost speed and then release to jump.

Jump on an enemy bonce to murder them with your trousers. 

Do this, and you steal their precious speed so your trousers let you run faster. Marvelous!

Avoid pits!

Get your mum back!

JAZZ!
